msbt.message: I'm done. Life goal achieved. That had the nerve to tell me I look rad in this outfit.I mean, yeah, NOW it sounds like a normal thing to say. Justno one ever says stuff like that to me! Aaah!
My mind is blown. There's this band I've been into since foreverand likes 'em too!Just shows you never can tell, huh? I'm so psyched to freak out over the new album with someone else!
I was talkin' with and said could talk to me till the sun comes up!'s sayin' likes chatting with me SO MUCH that loses track of time, . Awww!
Y'knowseems like you and me've gotten into realer stuff lately without even noticing.Usually I'd be embarrassed about it, but nah. It's chill. I'd talk about anything with you, .
Guess it's true that some stuff you can't get out without sittin' down and hashing things out like this.Hah! That's the best thing about you, . We really GET each other, .
It's so good to be able to let my hair down. I can vent about whatever to you. That's REAL friendship!What I'm gettin' at here is, we should hang out more, .
